Former NOTW editor Andy Coulson resigned as the Prime Minister's head of communications saying the drip-drip of claims about illegal eavesdropping under his editorship meant he could not "give the 110% needed".

". As Google's new chief executive, Page will lead product development and technology strategy, along with all day-to-day operations of the firm. Sergey Brin , who co-founded Google with Page, will devote his time and energy to strategic projects, in particular working on new products. His title will remain co-founder. In a blog post, Eric Schmidt said that he had been working with Page and Sergey Brin on ways to simplify Google's management structure and quicken decision making.

January 2010, a visibly shaken Simon Cowell appeared before the Television Critics Association meeting in Pasadena to say that he and Fox had reached an agreement that morning. "Where we have come to," he said, is that The X Factor will launch in America in 2011, with me judging the show and executive-producing the show, and because of that, this will be my last season on At the Idol finale on May 26, 2010, a wistful Simon Cowell looked out over the crowd one last time. "It felt very weird, he says, remembering the moment.
